<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158336</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2605</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Gravitaional fields created by the earth and the moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gravitaional fängt erstellt durch 
die Masse und den Mond auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les zones de Gravitaional créées par la terre et
la lune</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os campos de Gravitaional criados pela terra e 
pela lua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I campi di Gravitaional creati dalla terra e dalla
luna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα πεδία Gravitaional που δημιουργούνται από τη γη 
και το φεγγάρι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los campos de Gravitaional creados por la tierra y
la luna</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A demonstration which shows the gravitational fields which are created between the earth and the moon, and their relative strengths</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force of gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Demonstration, die das Gravitations zeigt, 
fängt welche zwischen der Masse und dem Mond erstellt werden
und ihre relativen Stärken auf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une démonstration qui montre aux zones de la 
gravité ce qui sont créés entre la terre et la lune, et leurs 
forces relatives</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma demonstração que mostre aos campos 
gravitacionais quais são criados entre a terra e a lua, e suas 
forças relativas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una dimostrazione che mostra ai campi 
gravitazionali quale sono creati fra la terra e la luna e le loro 
resistenze relative</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια επίδειξη που εμφανίζει βαρύτητας πεδία που 
δημιουργούνται μεταξύ της γης και του φεγγαριού, και των σχετικών 
δυνάμεών τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una demostración que muestra a campos 
gravitacionales cuáles se crean entre la tierra y la luna, y sus 
fuerzas relativas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft von Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de la pesanteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lune</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força da gravidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza di gravità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη της βαρύτητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φεγγάρι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza de la gravedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tierra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
